properties.description: Stores dialog useful data.
properties.name: _misc

properties.description: Object with  references
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Allow or denied scroll
properties.name: allowScroll

properties.description: Dialog is closed when click outside it.               Values can be: true or false.               Default: false
properties.name: blur

properties.description: Dialog may have a button that will close it.               Values can be: true or false.               Default: true
properties.name: closable

properties.description: Reference to the content element
properties.name: content

properties.description: Sets spacers to the content section.               Values: true, false.               Default: true
properties.name: defaultStyle

properties.description: Dialog draggable.               Values can be: true or false.               Default: false
properties.name: drag

properties.description: Reference to the footer element
properties.name: footer

properties.description: Makes the dialog footer visible or not.               Default: false
properties.name: hasFooter

properties.description: Dialog title
properties.name: heading

properties.description: Dialog height.               Values can be: any of the height CSS values
properties.name: height

properties.description: Dialog maximizable.               Values can be: true or false.               Default: false
properties.name: maximize

properties.description: Dialog minimum height.               Value must be int number.               Default: 200
properties.name: minHeight

properties.description: Dialog minimizable.               Values can be: true or false.               Default: false
properties.name: minimize

properties.description: Dialog minimum width.               Value must be int number.               Default: 250
properties.name: minWidth

properties.description: Allow page components inaccessible until interact with dialog.               Values can be: true or false.               Default: false
properties.name: modal

properties.description: Position of more than one open dialogs.               Values can be: centered or scaled.               Default: centered
properties.name: multiposition

properties.description: Dialog resizable.               Values can be: true or false.               Default: false
properties.name: resize

properties.description: Distance in pixels between scaled dialogs.               Value must be int number.                Default: 20
properties.name: scaleBreak

properties.description: Dialog width.               Values can be: any of the width CSS values
properties.name: width

methods.description: Adds dialog content
methods.name: _addContent

methods.description: Adds drag listeners
methods.name: _addDragListeners

methods.description: Establishes limits for dialog movement
methods.name: _addDragListeners

methods.description: Adds dialog footer
methods.name: _addFooter

methods.description: Adds dialog heading and its different options
methods.name: _addHeading

methods.description: Adds maximize button and its functionality.
methods.name: _addMaximize

methods.description: Adds minimize button and its functionality.
methods.name: _addMinimize

methods.description: Adds overlay if the dialog is modal type.
methods.name: _addOverlay

methods.description: Adds resize listeners.
methods.name: _addResizeListeners

params.description: Type of resizer, side or corner
params.name: type

methods.description: Adds resizes and their functionality.
methods.name: _addResizes

methods.description: Calculations needed to centered the dialog.
methods.name: _assignCenterPosition

methods.description: Establishes the maximum and minimum sizes of dialog.
methods.name: _assignSize

methods.description: Positions the dialog in the center of the window.
methods.name: _center

methods.description: Creates fast access to elements
methods.name: _createRefs

methods.description: Depending on the allowScroll property we append the user content to the custom scroll or not
methods.name: _handleContentScroll

methods.description: Handles corners resize functionality.
methods.name: _handleCornerResize

methods.description: Sets dialog width when do the window resize.
methods.name: _handleDialogSize

methods.description: Depending on the hasFooter property it will append/remove the footer from the dialog
methods.name: _handleFooterAppend

methods.description: Handles sides resize functionality.
methods.name: _handleSideResize

methods.description: Handles window edges so that the dialog does not exceed it.
methods.name: _handleWindowEdges

methods.description: Handles different options of the dialog when doing the resizing of the window.
methods.name: _handleWindowResize

methods.description: Returns true if it is the first scaled dialog opened.
methods.name: _isFirstScaled

methods.description: Sets the limit of the window for cases in which, when opening several scaled dialogs, they do not exceed them.
methods.name: _limitPosition

methods.description: Maximize functionality.
methods.name: _maximize

methods.description: Maximize functionality.
methods.name: _minimize

methods.description: Puts the dialog in the foreground by clicking on it.
methods.name: _moveToFront

methods.description: Stores the initial size of the dialog.
methods.name: _registerInitialSize

methods.description: Returns a maximized or minimized dialog to its default position.
methods.name: _restore

methods.description: Returns the dialog size and position after maximize or minimize it.
methods.name: _restorePreviousStatus

methods.description: Saves the dialog size and position before maximize or minimize it.
methods.name: _savePreviousStatus

methods.description: When there is more than one dialog open, position them scaled.
methods.name: _scale

methods.description: Checks if the default element style should be applied
methods.name: _setDefaultStyle

methods.description: Sets the position of the dialogs depending on the value of multiposition properties.
methods.name: _setPosition

methods.description: Controls the different screens versions.
methods.name: _verifyDeviceVersion

methods.description: Closes the dialog.
methods.name: close

methods.description: Opens the dialog.
methods.name: open
